entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ContainerArchiveOutputPath is not effecive on new .NET 8 container support while running on Framework #36651
  • [NETSDKE2E][VS64][Unstable][Regression]"Unable to read data from the transport connection: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host..." error happens during publish project in CLI. #36643

Closed

  • src/Containers/Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers/LocalDaemons/ArchiveFileRegistry.cs #36649
  • No frameworks were found but actually installed #36594

PullRequests

Created

  • add missing --archiveoutputpath option to .NET Framework container tool task #36652
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • update editorconfig template #36642
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the format of tool exceptions and NuGet API exceptions to be graceful #36641
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Reenable AOT tests disabled during the net9 migration #36636
    untriaged

Updated

  • Switch back to the RC2 build since GA has gone internal. #36578
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2307606 #36497
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update stage0 #36621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
